Anatomie Worldwide Headquarters

settings.title: “The Best Travel Pants<br class="br-desktop">On The Market.”
DESIGNED TO FLY
settings.text:
Kate and Shawn Boyer founded Anatomie in 2006 after years in the activewear business. Budapest-born Kate got a MBA in International Trade in France, while working as a girls' gymnastics coach and dressing the team in outfits she designed herself. From there, the self-taught designer developed private label collections for many exclusive resorts in St. Barth.

She met her husband Shawn in Miami, where the Ohio native was designing customized clothing for hard-to-fit athletic men. The two joined forces to design sportswear for brands such as Elite Models, Cigarette Boats, Lamborghini and Nikki Beach clubs.

With Kate as CEO and Shawn as Creative Director, they launched Anatomie, a name that speaks to the impeccable fit and sleek tailoring of the brand's designs.

"We know a woman's body- all the different types and fits that flatter each shape the best," explains Kate.

The duo transitioned their activewear background into the athleisure category, taking it to the next level as a travel-specific luxury line with exclusive distribution and marketing partnerships. Today the brand is carried in more than 400 specialty stores, private clubs, resorts, golf shops, and spas nationwide.

settings.title:
Our customers are the most dynamic ladies on planet Earth.
They are the ones that made us evolve from activewear to designer travel wear.
- Shawn
settings.review1: What I love most about Anatomie is the versatility of the clothing. Although the brand was designed for athleisure wear I wear the clothing to work, for pleasure and I recently even wore an outfit to breathwork class.
settings.review2: Finally I found travel clothes that suit my needs. Anatomie's style is classic, and it goes from morning to evening, as a matter of changing my accessories and shoes.

settings.title: LUXURY REIMAGINED
settings.text:
We believe that traveling freely is one of the greatest privileges in life. Our mission is to become the most-loved luxury travel brand in the world.

We exist to outfit the global traveler- and everyday adventurer- in the most comfortable and stylish performance apparel. We define Anatomie as a luxury brand, but for us, luxury is not a price point; it's a feeling of ultimate comfort and personalized experience. From our apparel to our concierge service, our goal is to make you feel pampered, confident and well put-together. Our clothing is designed with a style-meets-function mentality and is executed with European fabrics and craftsmanship.

settings.title: WHEN FEEL + FIT COME TOGETHER
settings.text:
Our clothes stand out because of the way they feel and fit. We use the finest European fabrics and work with premier factories in Italy and Hungary that have a history of excellence. To create limited edition styles, we sometimes partner with designer factories in China or Pakistan, which helps us keep price points low without compromising Anatomie's quality standards.

We use only the most luxurious leather in our jackets and vests. Fusing the buttery soft material with panels in mesh or Lycra creates ultra-comfortable designs with a flattering, feminine shape. Our unique power mesh details offer stretch, UV protection and a sexy, yet sophisticated look.

settings.title: THE PERFECT BLEND OF COMFORT + STYLE
settings.text:
Our signature lightweight stretch-woven fabric is used in all our essential pants and jackets for a perfect blend of comfort and style. Developed in France, it's:

  • Wrinkle-free
  • Moisture-wicking
  • Quick-drying
  • Highly-durable

In other words: it's ideal for travel and everyday. Featuring the same benefits, a heavier version of the above fabric is used in all the white and sand colors of our pants and jackets to prevent show-through.

The curve-hugging fabrics and silhouettes are meticulously designed for each body type. Please click here to find the best styles for your body type. Or give us a call at 305.576.1900, so that one of our fit experts can help you into a whole new world of comfort and style.

settings.column1:
WRINKLE FREE

Forget ironing. Most of our designs are crafted of innovative fabrics, which won't wrinkle or smoothen out as you wear them.

COMFORTABLE

Comfort is key, whether you're flying around the world or through a jam-packed day. That's why we use breathable, lightweight fabrics you can literally live in and add stretch panels to jackets for ease of movement.

EASY CARE

The majority of our clothes are low-maintenance. Simply machine wash cold on a gentle cycle, then tumble dry low. Or hand-wash your item in a hotel sink and hang to dry (approximate dry time: two hours) or blow dry in seven minutes. It's that easy. No dry cleaning is ever required, except for our specialty leather styles.
settings.column2:
SUPER LIGHTWEIGHT

One pair of pants weighs 0.6 pounds; two pairs weigh less than a banana. We use ultra-lightweight fabrics that feel amazing all day and take up minimal space in your suitcase.

VERSATILE

Our timelessly chic designs can be work day to night, season to season, from one time zone to the next. No wonder women of all ages rely on our clothing for traveling the world and elevating everyday style.

PACKABLE

Seven pieces including a mixture of pants, tops and jackets- weigh only four pounds and make the perfect wardrobe for a week-long trip.

settings.title: Micato Safaris & AmericaShare
settings.description:
Micato Safaris has landed in the #1 spot on Travel+Leisure’s World’s Best Safari Outfitter list an unprecedented nine times and has made the list every year since the survey started, giving Micato the distinction of being the only tour company in T+L’s Hall of Fame. Micato has also won five Condé Nast Traveler World Savers Awards: Three for Education and two for “Doing It All.”

When Felix and Jane Pinto founded Micato Safaris more than 50-years ago in Africa, their only business plan was to treat guests like family. No matter what the Micato adventure, whether it’s a Classic scheduled departure or a designed-specially-for-you Custom journey, for Micato it’s personal. Every member of the Micato team in the U.S. and Africa is steadfastly committed to providing experiences that exceed expectations.

Micato’s non-profit arm AmericaShare, formed 35 years ago, has deep roots in educating vulnerable and impoverished children: though the Micato One for One Commitment, the company sends a child to school for every guest on safari. Of all the reasons we can think of for you to safari with us, this is our favorite.

settings.title: Forbes Travel Guide
settings.description: Forbes Travel Guide named Anatomie as one of its 2019 Brand Officials, meeting the rigorous standards of this independent, global rating system to represent the best products and services in the luxury hospitality industry. "We are proud to have Anatomie as the Official Luxury Travel Clothing Brand of Forbes Travel Guide" said Filip Boyen, CEO of Forbes Travel Guide. Savvy travelers know to pack smartly, opting for clothing that is wrinkle resistant, easy to maintain and does not take up too much luggage space. European fabrics and quality craftsmanship ensureluxurious and beautiful pieces. Anatomie checks all of those boxes. Visit www.forbestravelguide.com for reviews and ratings on more than 1,600 of the world’s most luxurious hotels, spas and restaurants.

settings.title: Signature Travel Network
settings.description:
Anatomie and Signature Travel Network are taking the runway to another level. The most loved luxury travel clothing brand is happy to partner with a travel network who puts the extra in extraordinary. Signature customers receive complimentary Anatomie concierge services and special discounts to help them fly in comfort and style.

Signature Travel Network was established in 1956, and today, includes more than 290 member travel agencies with over 600 retail locations in the United States, Canada, Brazil, Australia, New Zealand, Mexico and the Caribbean. Signature Travel Advisors handle every last detail, so you tackle the fun. They have meticulously researched what's both of-the-moment and off-the-beaten-path. Their insider knowledge is what elevates a trip from a typical getaway to a life-changing journey. You receive the benefit of their exclusive privileges and complimentary amenities, as well as access to one-of-a-kind experiences. To find a Signature Travel Advisor, please visit www.anatomie.com/pages/escape-artists

settings.title: Preferred Hotels & Resorts
settings.description:
Preferred Hotels & Resorts, the world’s largest independent hotel brand, with more than 650 hotels and resorts across 80 countries, is thrilled to offer Anatomie consumers Elite Member status in its I Prefer Hotel Rewards loyalty program. Elite Members enjoy a suite of travel benefits during every stay including a unique welcome amenity, upgraded internet service, early check-in and late check-out, and complimentary upgrades. Members also earn points per dollar spent that can be used for future stays and experiences.  

Enroll today for instant Elite Members status and begin discovering the many hundreds of thrilling global destinations Anatomie fans can explore in style.

Terms and Conditions: I Prefer Elite status offer is valid for new enrolments prior to June 30, 2021.  Limited to new I Prefer Members. Subject to change and restrictions without notice.

settings.title: PGA - Professional Golfers Association of America
settings.description: Anatomie is proud to be a partner with PGA - Professional Golfers Association of America. Founded in 1916, the PGA Championship is an annual golf tournament conducted by the Professional Golfers' Association of America. Consisting of nearly 29,000 men and women members, the PGA of America's undertaking is to establish and elevate the standards of the profession and to grow interest and participation in the game of golf. For more information and up-to-date golf news, visit: www.pga.com - or contact Kate Boyer kate@anatomie.com

settings.title: AGM - Association of Golf Merchandising
settings.description: Since 2016, Anatomie is an official member and vendor partner of the Association of Golf Merchandisers. The Association of Golf Merchandisers is an international, professional organization of golf-related merchandisers and vendors. Members include buyers, merchandisers, golf professionals, students, club managers, owners and suppliers to the golf industry. For more information, please visit: - contact: Holly Hall at holly@anatomie.com

settings.title: SPA Association
settings.description: Since 1991, the International SPA Association has been recognized worldwide as the professional organization and voice of the spa industry, representing health and wellness facilities and providers in more than 70 countries. Members encompass the entire arena of the spa experience, from resort/hotel, destination, mineral springs, medical, club and day spas to service providers such as physicians, wellness instructors, nutritionists, massage therapists and product suppliers. For more information, please visit www.experienceispa.com

settings.title: MasterCard, SimplyMiles Program Partner
settings.description:
Spend with your Mastercard credit card on Anatomie.com and/or Anatomie Global Headquarters in Miami, Florida and Earn Miles to use with American Airlines towards your next wanderlust adventure. Welcome to a new world of comfort and style!  

Offer valid online at Anatomie.com and/or Anatomie Global Headquarters in Miami, Florida. Offer excludes taxes, shipping & handling charges. Offer cannot be combined with any other promo. Returns or exchanges valid only within 30-days of original purchase date. Must use your Mastercard as form(s) of payment. Offer may not be redeemed for cash, sold, or altered. Internet distribution on coupon sites is strictly prohibited. Void where prohibited. Additional exclusions possible, terms apply.  

For more info, please visit www.simplymiles.com/

settings.title: Make A Wish
settings.description: Anatomie is a proud supporter of the Make-A-Wish Foundation. Their mission resonates with us. Make-A-Wish foundation's mission says: together, we create life-changing wishes for children with critical illnesses. Wishes are more than just a nice thing. And they are far more than gifts, or singular events in time. Wishes impact everyone involved—wish kids, volunteers, donors, sponsors, medical professionals and communities. For wish kids, just the act of making their wish come true can give them the courage to comply with their medical treatments. Parents might finally feel like they can be optimistic. And still others might realize all they have to offer the world through volunteer work or philanthropy.

settings.title: Cultural Cuba
settings.description:
“Our trip to Cuba with Cultural Cuba shattered our lofty expectations. It provided a perfect balance of structured itinerary and flexibility making it seem like we were immersed in Cuban culture and history while at the same time feeling like we were on vacation. In addition to the first class accommodations, every experience felt exclusive and VIP making the trip truly memorable.” – B. Davidowitz

Cultural Cuba manages the entire destination management process; all the required travel documentation, RT Havana airport transfers, pre-paid lux hotel accommodations, top-notch dynamic guides, dedicated drivers and air-conditioned transportation, restaurant reservations at vetted private and very popular “paladares,” exclusive interactions with Cuban artists and musicians, behind-the-scenes access to special sites, and more.

www.culturalcuba.com

settings.title: Transafrica Safaris
settings.description: We are delighted to have this new VIP partnership for Anatomie customers. Luxury tailor-made travel since 1918, Trans Africa Safaris offers unique destination experiences throughout Southern & East Africa and the Indian Ocean Islands. To book your trip, visit www.transafricasafaris.com or contact res@transafricasafaris.com

settings.custom_html: At Anatomie, we believe comfort and style should go hand in hand. Our luxury women’s clothing is perfect for a weekend away or relaxing night in. Our quick-dry material stretches to fit any lifestyle and is always wrinkle-free. From business casual to athleisure attire, Anatomie offers sustainable collections to suit all occasions. Your clothing should be easy to take care of, easy to pack, and easy to live in. Whether you shop our essential lightweight travel pants, or the complete catalog of women’s travel clothing, you will be sure to find your favorite look. Escape into Anatomie’s new world of clothing that was designed just for you.

settings.text:
ANATOMIE is proud to introduce the only must-have performance pant with a LIFETIME GUARANTEE.

    • Our Lifetime Warranty covers the replacement/repair of select essential Anatomie pants if fabric is defective or damaged due to normal wear and tear.
    • Please save proof of purchase needed for your Lifetime Warranty.
    • You are responsible for the cost of shipping the product back to us, however, we will return the favor and ship your repaired/replacement pants back to you at no charge.
    • Our Lifetime Warranty on our pant fabric does not go beyond practical usage. Normal wear and tear does not include damages resulting from abuse, lost/missing hardware, cosmetic/stain damages, and incidental damages.
    • Lifetime Warranty extends only to the original owner.

settings.title: Shop our Essential Pant Styles & Qualify for our Lifetime Warranty!

settings.text: When you travel, maximizing your valuable time is essential. This means every aspect of your journey should be tailored just for you. When you use an Anatomie Escape Artist to plan your trip you receive the benefit of their extensive destination and product expertise, exclusive privileges and complimentary amenities, as well as access to one-of-a kind experiences. Read on to learn more about the benefits of working with our Escape Artists.

settings.heading: LUXURY REIMAGINED
settings.text:
We believe that traveling freely is one of the greatest privileges in life. Our mission is to become the most-loved luxury travel brand in the world.

We exist to outfit the global traveler - and everyday adventurer - in the most comfortable and stylish performance apparel. We define Anatomie as a luxury brand, but for us, luxury is not a price point; it's a feeling of ultimate comfort and personalized experience.

From our apparel to our concierge service, our goal is to make you feel pampered, confident and well put-together. Our clothing is designed with a style-meets-function mentality and executed with European fabrics and craftsmanship.

settings.title: SAFE TRAVELS
settings.texthtml:
Travel has become more complicated since COVID-19 entered our vocabulary. Pre-COVID your top questions were probably beach or mountains and what the weather is like this time of the year. Now you have many more boxes to tick off before your next journey.

What are the different state or country border closures, regulations for quarantine, testing? What insurance should I purchase? Though the list is longer, none are daunting when you are working with an Anatomie Escape Artist who can guide you to the right resources to make informed decisions about your travels.

settings.heading: Exclusive Benefits
settings.lefthtml:
• Complimentary Breakfast for two daily
  • Valuable benefits (varies by property) such as a $100 dining or resort credit, spa treatment etc.
  • Room upgrades, early check-in and late check-out when available
  • Plus other privileges at more than 1,000 of the world's most luxurious hotels, resorts, lodges and spas
settings.righthtml:
• Prepaid gratuities and shipboard credits
  • Hosted sailings and complimentary private car and driver shore excursions
  • Onboard and onshore private events
  • Enjoy a range of exclusive extras when you reserve your cruise with an Escape Artist

settings.title:
Our customers are the most dynamic ladies on planet Earth.
They are the ones that made us evolve from activewear to designer travel wear.

settings.custom_html: AS SEEN IN:

settings.custom_description: A fashion-forward update on the safari jacket, Kenya features a flattering feminine fit and plenty of pockets for your travel essentials. Crafted in our wrinkle-free, moisture-wicking, quick-drying stretch woven fabric, Kenya is ready for adventures far and near.

Our bestselling cargo pant, Kate fuses chic European sensibility with impeccable tailoring and comfort. With a skinny silhouette crafted in our signature curve-hugging, breathable stretch, Kate is ideal for travel and everyday wear and includes our Lifetime Guarantee.
With a sleek silhouette crafted in super soft viscose with elegant signature stretch mesh overlay, Kim is our must-have lightweight long-sleeve top, ready for wherever your next adventure takes you.

settings.review1: Finally I found travel clothes that suit my needs. Anatomie's style is classic, and it goes from morning to evening, as a matter of changing my accessories and shoes.
settings.review2: If you want something that can take you from morning to night and still be comfortable tackle the day ahead, Anatomie fits and wears like a dream. The fabric is what makes it so special, hugs my curves in all the right spots and lasts FOREVER!

settings.title: Style Exchange Policy:
settings.text:
We are obsessed with fit. Each of our styles is designed with your body shape in mind. If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, simply start your exchange process today.

For more information, please visit our SHIPPING & RETURNS page.
